nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_817
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Word came yesterday that they were killed while trying to reach the summit.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_818
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Under no circumstances shall I mention to anyone that I have turned down the invitation to her wedding.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_819
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: It made the headlines that the president's wife threatened her husband with public exposure.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_820
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: That wealthy lady's repeated demand for a premarital agreement greatly harmed her prospective husband's self-esteem and ended up in his refusal to get married.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_821
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Make no mistake about it, some women would insist on the right to get a divorce if their husbands did not earn as much as they expected.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_822
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The casual discovery of the fingerprint shed some light on the murder he had been looking into.
